code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import ingredientsReducer from'./slices/ingredients-slice';import constructorReducer from'./slices/constructor-slice';import ingredientDetailsReducer from'./slices/ingredient-details-slice';import orderReducer from'./slices/order-slice';import tabsReducer from'./slices/tabs-slice';import userReducer from'./slices/user-slice';export const store=configureStore({reducer:{ingredients:ingredientsReducer,burgerConstructor:constructorReducer,ingredientDetails:ingredientDetailsReducer,order:orderReducer,tabs:tabsReducer,user:userReducer},devTools:process.env.NODE_ENV!=='production'});
